Name: Prairie Oyster
Ingredients: 5 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Taking care not to break the egg yolk, PLACE it in the centre of the hollow in the glass. SHAKE the rest of the ingredients with ice and strain over the egg. Instruct the drinker to drink in one gulp.
Review: This 'pick-me-up' (A.K.A. hangover cure) may be a somewhat daunting prospect irrespective of the present state of your constitution.
